amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to require airlines to reinstate pilots who were fired or forced to resign because of vaccine mandates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 294 (Roll no. 346).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mrs. Miller (IL).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 294 (Roll no. 346).
